titleStmt.title: Five sermons preached upon severall occasions (The texts whereof are set downe in the next page.) By Iohn Seller.
titleStmt.author: Seller, John, 1592 or 3-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by B. Alsop and T. Fawcet] for Iohn Clark, and are to be sold at his shop under St. Peters church in Cornehill,

notesStmt.note: Errata on verso of M6, final leaf.
First leaf blank except for signature mark.
Reproduction of original in the University of Chicago. Library.

place.placeName: his shop under St. Peters church in Cornehill
